'''Parametric Transformer''' is a mysterious artifact found in the {{Quest|Tianqiu Treasure Trail}}.

This device can be placed on a valid surface and interacted with to deposit and transmute non-event items. A total quality of 150 or above needs to be added to initiate transmutation. (See [[#Fuel Type|Fuel Type]] on quality.)

A progress bar appears above the device and the player may use attacks that do Elemental Damage to charge it. If the device is placed next to an environmental hazard that deals Elemental Damage, such as an [[Electro Crystal]], this will also charge it. When the device is fully charged, it disappears and the player will obtain various rewards. (See [[#Possible Rewards|Possible Rewards]].)

This device has a cooldown of 6 days 22 hours (rounded up to 7 days in the gadget description) after it is used.

==Gauge Meter==
18 elemental attacks are required to fully charge up the parametric transformer, including player-dealt damage and environmental damage. The [[gauge unit]] of the elemental attack does not matter &mdash; for example, both the 2B application from Bennett's Elemental Skill and 1A application from Diluc's Elemental Skill will charge up around 5%. There is a '''0.4s''' cooldown between each instance of charging. This cooldown is not to be confused with the regular [[Internal Cooldown]] on elemental application, which does not take effect when charging the Parametric Transformer.

==Notes==
* Parametric Transformer can only be used or interacted while not in-combat state.
** Deployed transformer will be dismissed if player moved too far or if player [[Aggravation|aggroed]] a nearby enemy. Fuel used will not be returned but kept for next deployment.

The type of material used ''appear'' to increase the chance of receiving certain reward categories. (See [[#Reward Distribution|Reward Distribution]].) This observation is supported by statistical analyses from the Genshin Impact Data Gathering team.<ref name="Data Gathering">Genshin Impact Data Gathering Team: [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1M2EpQp0_i34Mb7dpjsczK0wSC8QHj3w4nBhC4vIfDXM Parametric Transformer - Groups distribution per material]</ref>

However, the reward category is <u>not</u> guaranteed by using only one type of material. It is also unclear how using two or more different materials may affect the result.
